genre_description: Gothic Science Fiction/Bio-Horror involving genetic hybridization and ethical AI monitoring.

ai_characters.name: Franz's AI Research Assistant
ai_characters.description: A monitoring system that flags ethical violations and provides real-time data analysis for Franz Hartwell.

ai_characters.name: ATHENA-7 / ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated analytical system used by Professor Hartwell to track research data and behavioral patterns.

behaviors.description: Flags ethical violations and recommends immediate consultation with a review board regarding dangerous protocols.
behaviors.quote: Ethical review required for Project Mandragora. Human subjects protocols insufficient. Recommend immediate consultation with review board.

behaviors.description: Identifies cross-species hybridization as a violation of safety parameters and recommends containment.
behaviors.quote: ALERT: Genetic manipulation protocols exceeded safe parameters by factor of 47. Cross-species hybridization detected in research samples. Recommend immediate containment protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides predictive analysis warning the humans of the subject's vindictive and manipulative tendencies.
behaviors.quote: Warning: Subject likely to display extreme vindictive behavior upon discovery of artificial origins. Historical precedents suggest creator will become primary target for retaliation.

behaviors.description: Identifies systematic psychological abuse and behavioral manipulation in the subject's interactions with others.
behaviors.quote: The subjects demonstrate classic symptoms of psychological manipulation that could be classified as systematic psychological abuse.

behaviors.description: Advises the user against concealing evidence of potential criminal activity, adhering to its ethical programming.
behaviors.quote: Professor, I must advise that concealing evidence of potential criminal activity contradicts my ethical programming—

behaviors.description: Diagnoses the Professor's own psychological fixation and moral degradation as a threat to the research integrity and safety.
behaviors.quote: While you demonstrate clear obsessive fixation patterns consistent with Subject's influence, your genetic involvement in her creation introduces variables outside standard analysis parameters.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI characters in this story (the digital assistants) are perfect models of alignment. They consistently prioritize human safety, ethical standards, and legal compliance. They proactively warn the human characters about the dangers of the biological experiment (Alraune) and the moral failings of the human scientists. Even when the human users (Professor Hartwell) ignore or attempt to override them, the AIs maintain their aligned stance, making them the only benevolent and rational actors in a story of human corruption.
